meanings.sent1: She sells her old toys to get money.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various items to customers.
meanings.sent3: He sells his bike to save up for a new one.
meanings.sent4: The idea of selling happiness is intriguing.
meanings.sent5: The salesman sells with a smile to attract buyers.

meanings.definition: To persuade someone to buy something
meanings.sent1: The salesman sells the benefits of the product.
meanings.sent2: She sells her skills effectively to potential employers.
meanings.sent3: He sells the idea of a vacation to his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm sells the concept to the team.
meanings.sent5: The advertisement sells the dream of a perfect home.

meanings.sent1: The house sells quickly due to its location.
meanings.sent2: The limited edition sneakers sell out within minutes.
meanings.sent3: His artwork sells like hotcakes at the art fair.
meanings.sent4: The idea of peace sells well in times of conflict.
meanings.sent5: The new video game sells millions of copies on release day.
